data package

Submodules

data.cvae_data_pipeline module

The data pipeline for the images fed into the Convolutional Variational Autoencoder

Date Created: July 12, 2023 Last Updated: July 12, 2023

data.cvae_data_pipeline.clean_directory(clean_dir, log_file='/scratch/jhowe4/outputs/uhn/CK7/error_log.txt')[source]

removes any corrupt images from a directory.

Args:

clean_dir (str): expects the directory in which the images are

data.cvae_data_pipeline.organize_dir(root_dir)[source]

A function that changes directory structure from:

root_dir/
001_files/
5.0/

img1.jpeg … imgN.jpeg

… 100_files/

…

to:

root_dir/
folder/

001-5.0-im1.jpeg … 100-5.0-imN.jpeg

Args:

root_dir (str): The path to the root directory you wish to be reorganized

data.cvae_data_pipeline.preprocess_directory(root_path)[source]

A function that cleans and reorganizes a directory for convolutional variational autoencoder. Assumes a structure of:

root_path/

train/ test/ valid/

With each of train, test, and valid having directory structure as assumed in organize_root

Args:

root_path (str): The path to the root directory
